mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT l.id,l.name,l.longitude,l.latitude FROM t_activity a RIGHT JOIN t_activity_assignment aa ON a.`id` = aa.`activity_id` LEFT JOIN t_location l ON l.`id` = aa.`location_id` WHERE a.id = #{activityId} AND a.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY l.name

SELECT a.`id`,a.`name` AS activityName,a.`theme`,c.`name` AS categoryName,a.`begin_date`,a.`end_date`,a.`status`,a.`allowed_department_id` FROM t_activity a LEFT JOIN t_category c ON a.`category_id` = c.`id` WHERE a.`id` = #{activityId} AND a.`del_flag` = 0
SELECT c.id AS categoryId,c.`name` AS categoryName,COUNT(a.id) AS nums FROM t_activity a LEFT JOIN t_category c ON c.`id` = a.`category_id` WHERE a.`del_flag` = 0 GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY nums DESC

SELECT aa.id AS id,ts.`begin_time`,ts.`end_time`,ts.`id` AS timeSlotId,l.`name` AS locationName,l.`id` AS locationId,aa.time,aa.`status`,aat.`name` AS typeName ,aat.`id` AS typeId,aa.qr_code_url,aa.group_account FROM t_activity_assignment aa LEFT JOIN t_location l ON l.id = aa.`location_id` LEFT JOIN t_time_slot ts ON ts.id = aa.`time_slot_id` LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment_type aat ON aat.id = aa.`type_id` WHERE aa.id IN( SELECT aa.`id` FROM t_activity_assignment aa WHERE aa.`activity_id` = #{activityId} AND aa.`del_flag` = 0 ) AND ts.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY aat.`id`,l.`name`,ts.`begin_time`
